Description.DefaultText: Adds two new armour variations to the Single Player module, adapted from DA2 resources. Copies of sample items utilizing these variations can be found in chest on ground level of the Redcliffe Castle after the Landsmeet arc has been completed. (technical notes: the pieces use variation IDs in range 177-182)
Description.en-us:
Adds two new armour variations to the Single Player module, adapted from DA2 resources. Copies of sample items utilizing these variations can be found in chest on ground level of the Redcliffe Castle after the Landsmeet arc has been completed.
(technical notes: the pieces use variation IDs in range 177-182)
